tgt_original: 從非有想非無想處起，乃至還入初禪。 是菩薩依師子奮迅三昧，入超越三昧。 云何為超越三昧？

src_original: pāpakair akuśalair dharmaiḥ savitarkaṃ savicāraṃ vivekajaṃ prītisukhaṃ prathamaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati,  prathamād dhyānād vyutthito dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ upasaṃpadya viharati,  dvitīyād dhyānād vyutthitas tṛtīyaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati,
tgt_original: 菩薩離欲、離諸惡不善法，有覺有觀，離生喜樂，入初禪，從初禪起乃至入非有想非無想處；

src_original: evaṃ ānanda bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ ṣaṭsu pāramitāsu carañ caturṣu smṛtyupasthāneṣu  caran samyakprahāṇarddhipādendriyabalabodhyaṅgeṣu carann adhyātmaśūnyatāyāṃ caran
tgt_original: 阿難！

src_original: tṛtīyād dhyānād vyutthitaś caturthaṃ dhyānam upasaṃpadya viharati,  caturthyād dhyānād vyutthita ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattim upasaṃpadya viharati,  ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpatter vyutthito vijñānānantyāyatanasamāpattim upasaṃpadya viharati,  vijñānānantyāyatanasamāpatter vyutthita ākiṃcanyāyatanasamāpattim upasaṃpadya viharati,  ākiṃcanyāyatanasamāpatter vyutthito naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattim upasaṃpadya viharati,  naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpatter vyutthitaḥ saṃjñāvedayitanirodhasamāpattim upasaṃpadya viharati. nirodhasamāpatter vyutthitaḥ prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,
tgt_original: 非有想非無想處起入滅受想定。

src_original: prathamād dhyānād vyutthito nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate,
tgt_original: 滅受想定起還入初禪，從初禪起入滅受想定；

src_original: bahirdhāśūnyatāyāṃ caran yāvad abhāvasvabhāvaśūnyatāyāṃ carann apramāṇadhyānārūpyasamāpattiṣu  carann āryasatyeṣu caran sarvavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukheṣu caran śūnyatānimittāpraṇihiteṣu  carann abhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmeṣu caran sarvākārajñatāyāṃ  caran kuśalamūlair vivardhamāno 'sthānam anavakāśo yad anuttarāyāḥ samyaksaṃbodheḥ  parihāsyate nedaṃ sthānaṃ vidyate. asyāṃ khalu punaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ bhāṣyamāṇāyāṃ
tgt_original: 如是菩薩行六波羅蜜，行四念處乃至行一切種智，增益善根，若不得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，無有是處！

src_original: nirodhasamāpatter vyutthito dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate dvitīyād dhyānād vyutthito nirodhasamāpittiṃ samāpadyate,
tgt_original: 滅受想定起還入二禪，二禪起入滅受想定；

src_original: nirodhasamāpatter vyutthitas tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,  tṛtīyād dhyānād vyutthito nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate,
tgt_original: 滅受想定起入三禪，三禪起入滅受想定；

src_original: nirodhasamāpatter vyutthitaś caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,  caturthād dhyānād vyutthito nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate,
tgt_original: 滅受想定起入四禪，四禪起入滅受想定；

src_original: nirodhasamāpatter vyutthita ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate,  ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpatter vyutthito nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate,  nirodhasamāpatter vyutthito vijñānānantyāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate,  vijñānānantyāyatanasamāpatter vyutthito nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate,  nirodhasamāpatter vyutthita ākiṃcanyāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate,  ākiṃcanyāyatanasamāpatter vyutthito nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate,
tgt_original: 滅受想定起入空處，空處起入滅受想定； 滅受想定起入識處，識處起入滅受想定； 滅受想定起入無所有處，無所有處起入滅受想定；

src_original: nirodhasamāpatter vyutthito naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate,  naivasaṃjñāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpatter vyutthito nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate,  nirodhasamāpatter vyutthito naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatānasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpatter vyutthito 'samāhite citte tiṣṭhaty,  asamāhitāc cittād nirodhasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate,
tgt_original: 滅受想定起入非有想非無想處，非有想非無想處起入滅受想定； 滅受想定起入散心中，散心中起入滅受想定。

src_original: nirodhasamāpatter vyutthito 'samāhite citte tiṣṭhaty,
tgt_original: 滅受想定起還入散心中。

src_original: catasraḥ pariṣado devamanuṣyayaksagandharvāsuragaruḍakiṃnaramahoragāś ca saṃnipatitāḥ saṃniṣanṇā abhūvan.  atha khalu bhagavāṃś catasṛṇāṃ parṣadāṃ puratas tathārūpam ṛddhyabhisaṃskāram abhisaṃskṛtavān
tgt_original: 」說是〈般若波羅蜜品〉時，佛在四眾中、天、人、龍、鬼神、甄陀羅、摩睺羅伽等，於大眾前而現神足變化：

src_original: asamāhitāc cittād naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate,  naivasaṃjñānāsaṃjñāyatanasamāpatter vyutthito 'samāhite citte tiṣṭhaty,  asamāhitāc cittād (PSP_5:104)
tgt_original: 散心中起入非有想非無想處，非有想非無想處起還住散心中；

src_original: vijñanānantyāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate,  vijñanānantyāyatanasamāpatter vyutthito 'samāhite citte tiṣṭhaty,  asamāhitāc cittād ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate,  ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpatter vyutthito 'samāhite citte tiṣṭhaty,
tgt_original: 散心中起入無所有處，無所有處起住散心中； 散心中起入識處，識處起住散心中；

src_original: asamāhitāc cittād ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpattiṃ samāpadyate,  ākāśānantyāyatanasamāpatter vyutthito 'samāhite citte tiṣṭhaty,
tgt_original: 散心中起入空處，空處起住散心中；

src_original: asamāhitāc cittāc caturthaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,  caturthād dhyānād vyutthito 'samāhite citte tiṣṭhaty,
tgt_original: 散心中起入第四禪，第四禪中起住散心中；

src_original: asamāhitāc cittāt tṛtīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,  tṛtīyād dhyānād vyutthito 'samāhite citte tiṣṭhaty,
tgt_original: 散心中起入第三禪，第三禪中起住散心中；

src_original: asamāhitāc cittād dvitīyaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,  dvitīyād dhyānād vyutthito 'samāhite citte tiṣṭhaty,
tgt_original: 散心中起入第二禪，第二禪中起住散心中；

src_original: asamāhitāc cittāt prathamaṃ dhyānaṃ samāpadyate,
tgt_original: 散心中起入初禪，初禪中起住散心中。

src_original: tasmād upāyakauśalyaṃ parigṛhītukāmena bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ
tgt_original: 以是故，菩薩摩訶薩欲得方便力，當行般若波羅蜜。

src_original: caritavyam. yasmin samaye bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carati prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayati,  prajñāpāramitāyāṃ yogam āpadyate,  tasmin samaye 'saṃkhyeyeṣu lokadhātuṣu ye buddhā bhagavantas tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti dharmañ (PSP_5:107)
tgt_original: 若菩薩摩訶薩如是行、如是習、如是修般若波羅蜜，是時，無量阿僧祇國土中現在諸佛念是行般若波羅蜜菩薩。

src_original: ato nirjātā hi subhūte 'tītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavanto yad uta ṣaḍbhyaḥ pāramitābhyaḥ,
tgt_original: 是般若波羅蜜中生過去、未來、現在諸佛故。

src_original: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivaṃ pratikāṅkṣitavyam,
tgt_original: 以是故，菩薩摩訶薩應如是思惟：

src_original: aham apy enān dharmān anuprāpsyāmi ye tair atītānāgatapratyutpannair buddhair bhagavadbhir
tgt_original: 『過去、未來、現在諸佛所得法，我亦當得。

src_original: anuprāptāḥ. evaṃ khalu subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena prajñāpāramitāyāṃ carataivaṃ yogam āpattavyam,
tgt_original: 』如是，須菩提！ 菩薩摩訶薩應習般若波羅蜜！

src_original: evaṃ prayujyamāno bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ kṣipram anuttarāṃ samyaksaṃbodhim abhisaṃbhotsyate.
tgt_original: 若如是習般若波羅蜜，疾得阿耨多羅三藐三菩提。

src_original: tasmāt tarhi subhūte bodhisattvena mahāsattvena sarvākārajñatāmanasikārāvirahitena
tgt_original: 以是故，菩薩摩訶薩常應不遠離薩婆若念。

src_original: bhavitavyam. sacet punaḥ subhūte bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ caran prajñāpāramitāyām  antaśo 'cchaṭāsaṃghātamātrakam api prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāvayiṣyati,  sa khhalu punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bahutarapuṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati,
tgt_original: 若菩薩摩訶薩如是行般若波羅蜜，乃至彈指頃，是菩薩福德甚多。

src_original: na tv eva ye trisāhasramahāsāhasre lokadhātau sattvās tān kaścid eva dānena saṃtarpayec  chīle pratiṣṭhāpayet kṣāntau pratiṣṭhāpayed vīrye pratiṣṭhāpayet samādhau pratiṣṭhāpayet  prajñāyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpayed vimuktau pratiṣṭhāpayed vimuktijñānadarśane pratiṣṭhāpayet,
tgt_original: 若有人教三千大千世界中眾生自恣布施，教令持戒、禪定、智慧，教令得解脫、解脫知見，教令得須陀洹果乃至阿羅漢果、辟支佛道，不如是菩薩修般若波羅蜜乃至彈指頃。

src_original: yathārūpeṇarddhyabhisaṃskāreṇābhi saṃskṛtenākṣobhyaṃ tathāgatam arhantaṃ samyaksaṃbuddhaṃ paśyanti sma,  bhikṣusaṃghaparivṛtaṃ bodhisattvagaṇapuraskṛtaṃ dharmaṃ deśayantaṃ sāgaropamāyāṃ
tgt_original: 一切大眾皆見阿閦佛，比丘僧圍繞，說法； 大眾譬如大海水，皆是阿羅漢；

src_original: srotaāpattiphale pratiṣṭhāpayet sakṛdāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayed anāgāmiphale pratiṣṭhāpayed arhattve pratiṣṭhāpayet pratyekabodhau pratiṣṭhāpayet. tat kasya hetoḥ?
tgt_original: 何以故？

src_original: ato nirjātā hi subhūte dānaśīlakṣāntivīryasamādhiprajñāvimuktivimuktijñānadarśanāni  srotaāpattiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ pratyekabodhiḥ. ye 'pi
tgt_original: 是般若波羅蜜中生布施、持戒、禪定、智慧、須陀洹果乃至辟支佛道；

src_original: te buddhā bhagavanto daśadiglokadhātuṣu tiṣṭhanti dhriyante yāpayanti,  te 'pito nirjātā yad uta prajñāpāramitātaḥ. ye 'pi te subhūte ' tītānāgatapratyutpannā buddhā bhagavantas te 'pīta eva prabhāvitā yad uta prajñāpāramitātaḥ.
tgt_original: 十方現在諸佛亦從般若波羅蜜中生，過去、未來諸佛亦從般若波羅蜜中生故。

src_original: punar aparaṃ subhūte yo bodhisattvo mahāsattvo muhūrtaṃ vā divasaṃ vā divasaśataṃ  vā saṃvatsaraṃ vā saṃvatsaraśataṃ vā kalpaṃ vā kalpaśataṃ vā yāvad asaṃkhyeyān api  kalpāni māṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ sarvākārajñatāpratisaṃyuktair manasikārair bhāvayiṣyati,
tgt_original: 「復次，須菩提！ 菩薩摩訶薩應薩婆若念行般若波羅蜜，若須臾時、若半日、若一日、若一月、若百日、若一歲、若百歲、若一劫、若百劫，乃至無量無邊阿僧祇劫，是菩薩修是般若波羅蜜福德甚多；

src_original: sa bahutaraṃ puṇyaṃ prasaviṣyati. na tv eva ye gaṅgānadīvālukāsameṣu lokadhātuṣu  sattvās tān kaścid eva dānena saṃtarpayec chīle kṣāntau vīrye samādhau prajñāyāṃ  vimuktau vimuktijñānadarśane ca pratiṣṭhāpayet, (PSP_5:108)
tgt_original: 勝於教十方恒河沙等世界中眾生布施、持戒、禪定、智慧、解脫、解脫知見，教令得須陀洹果乃至辟支佛道。

src_original: kṣāntivīryasamādhiprajñāvimuktivimuktijñānadarśanaṃ prajñāptaṃ,  srotaāpattiphalaṃ sakṛdāgāmiphalam anāgāmiphalam arhattvaṃ pratyekabuddhatvaṃ prajñāptam.  iti buddhaiḥ sānāthyābhāvavikalpaḥ
tgt_original: 諸佛從般若波羅蜜中生，說是布施、持戒、禪定、智慧、解脫、解脫知見，須陀洹果乃至辟支佛道。

src_original: yaḥ punar aparaṃ bodhisattvo mahāsattva evaṃ yathopadiṣṭāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāyāṃ sthitaḥ,  sa khalu punar bodhisattvo mahāsattvo 'vinivartanīyaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ. tathāgatasamanvāgataḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
tgt_original: 「若有菩薩摩訶薩如般若波羅蜜所說住，當知是菩薩摩訶薩是阿鞞跋致，為諸佛所念，如是方便力成就；

src_original: upāyakauśalyena samanvāgato bahubuddhakoṭīniyutaśatasahasraparyupāsitaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ. avaropitakuśalamūlaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,  kalyāṇamitraparigṛhītaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,  ṣaṭpāramitāvatīrṇaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ. viṃśatiśūnyatābhāvitaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,  saptatriṃśad bodhipakṣyadharmabhāvitaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,  āryasatyāpramāṇadhyānārūpyavimokṣasamādhisamāpattidhāraṇīmukhabhāvitaḥ sa bodhisattvo  mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ. śūnyatānimittāpraṇihitābhijñādaśabalavaiśāradyapratisaṃvidāveṇikabuddhadharmabhāvitaḥ
tgt_original: 當知是菩薩親近、供養無量千萬億諸佛，種善根，與善知識相隨，久行六波羅蜜，久修十八空、四念處乃至八聖道分、佛十力乃至一切種智；

src_original: sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,  ṣaḍ abhijñāpratilabdhaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,  kumārabhūtaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ. abhiprāyaparipūrṇaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,  buddhair avirahitaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,
tgt_original: 當知是菩薩住法王子地，滿足諸願，常不離諸佛，不離諸善根，從一佛國至一佛國；

src_original: kuśalamūlair avirahitaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ. anākṣiptapratibhānaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ,  dhāraṇīpratilabdhaḥ sa bodhisattvo mahāsattvaḥ pratikāṅkṣitavyaḥ. rūpapariniṣpattis tasya pratikāṅkṣitavyā,
